item.description:
Last time we played "New England" and "New World Carcassonne" and some fillers. This week we are back at Denis's in Londonderry (last time was Windham).

Denis's house is only 5 minutes from the "Game Castle" and right off Rt. 102, or about 10 minutes from exit 4 off Rt. 93.

Food will be served (Swedish meatballs and noodles).

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Gaming in Londonderry (NH)
